T02D2106:135b-0: @135b ` // gdams ngag nye bar bsdus pa bzhugs//
T02D2106:135b-2: # // 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2106:135b-3: chos kun rang bzhin 'jam dpal ye shes sems //
T02D2106:135b-4: ma lus bde gshegs kun gyi mtshan gyur pa //
T02D2106:135b-5: rdo rje 'chang chen rnams kyi glur blangs don //
T02D2106:135b-6: za bcing rgya che'i skye bo blo bzangs don //
T02D2106:135b-7: byang chub sems ldan lhag pa'i lhar mos la //
T02D2106:135b-8: sgyu ma'i rten 'brel rnam gsum sbyor ba las //
T02D2106:135b-9: ma lus gnyis med mkha' khyab sprul tshogs dgu'o //
T02D2106:135b-10: ma skyes mi 'gag sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs //
T02D2106:135b-11: rdo rje mig gis snang thob bar du blta //
T02D2106:135b-12: sgyu ma brag nam mkha'i rang bzhin du //
T02D2106:135b-13: yongs su shes nas ma zhen sems kyis bklag / gsang sngags tshul chen lam ni 'di yin te //
T02D2106:135b-14: ji ltar dngos rnams mkha' la gnas pa bzhin //
T02D2106:135b-15: dam tshig dkyil 'khor phyag rgya che la gnas //
T02D2106:135b-16: don de mi shes dka' ba'i lam gzhan gyis //
T02D2106:135b-17: 'khor ba'i grong gsum dag la de mi g-yo //
T02D2106:135b-18: de lta'i don shes rang bzhin nyes pa spangs //
T02D2106:136a-1: glang po ke ta ka zos bzhin //
T02D2106:136a-2: nyes pa'i tshogs bcom gzhung tshogs yon tan ldan //
T02D2106:136a-3: 'gag ba med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur //
T02D2106:136a-4: thugs kyi gsang mdzod gtsug gi rin po che //
T02D2106:136a-5: 'gro kun sems kyi rang bzhin chos rnams lung //
T02D2106:136a-6: rgyud kun dbang po rdo rje tshig tu gnas //
T02D2106:136a-7: mkhan po'i rjes 'brang nye bar gyur ba yin //
